form.SN:
v ameriški angleščini pišemo
signaling
in
signaled
.

sense.def:
A signal
je gib, zvok ali dejanje, ki naj bi imelo poseben pomen.

seg.quote: My signal will be three knocks.

sense.def:
To signal something
ali
to signal to someone
pomeni narediti gib ali povzročiti zvok, s katerim želimo nekomu posredovati določeno sporočilo.

seg.quote: Signal the driver to move off.
...a parent signalling to a child in the distance.
The helpers signalled that all was ready.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
signals an event
, po tistem lahko sklepamo, da se dogaja ali se bo kmalu zgodilo nekaj drugega.

seg.quote: This decision seemed to signal a switch in the paper's editorial policy.
...the crisis signalling that the final moment was near.
This was the first signal that an attack was brewing.

sense.def:
A signal
je tudi opozorilna oznaka ob železniških tirih, ki strojevodji pove, ali mora ustaviti ali ne.

A signal
je tudi niz zvočnih ali svetlobnih znakov, ki prenašajo določeno sporočilo.

seg.quote: Marconi finally succeeded in sending a signal across the Atlantic.
